messages.message:
Great to see the platform upgrade in progress banner in UAT (24.48.4) :sparklewrench:

Feedback: I was in the middle of troubleshooting/testing in UAT with @Kaustubh (KD) earlier last week, and we noticed in the middle of configuring a `Build` project that things stopped working properly/erroring out.

It wasn't until we went back to the home page/refreshed that we got the notification banner.

Feedback:
• It would be nice to have the banner pop up dynamically while working in Build projects so there's less confusion/timely awareness of what's going on that might be contributing to a potentially dissatisfactory experience.
• It would be nice to get some sort of heads up :bow: banner/email notification ahead of time even for non-scheduled upgrades (not sure if this is planned/implemented already, but sharing just in case)
• Is an upgrade still going on? This has been up since Friday, so just in case the banner isn't being switched to `off`, sharing here that I'm still seeing it as of the time of this post :memo: 
• It may be nice to be able to have a link to some status landing page in the banner to check on the progress/estimated time of completion (if that sort of thing is able to be / is already being calculated)

We’ll probably never have non-scheduled upgrades for aihub-uat, so this doesn’t apply in this situation (especially since the scheduled upgrades are so frequent :arrow_down:)

aihub-uat is deployed every few hours, so you probably saw the upgrade banner for separate instances of an upgrade
Cc @William Helmrath @Liam Callanan for the first and last bullets of feedback
